assignments.name: Initiate_error_Case_number_must_be_selected
assignments.label: Initiate error Case number must be selected

value.stringValue: Insert a Case number or select a Case from the list. It is also possible to create a new Case.

assignments.name: Initiate_error_Invalid_Case_number_inserted
assignments.label: Initiate error Invalid Case number inserted

value.stringValue: Inserted Case number is invalid. Insert a valid Case number.
Please select one Contact or one Account.
You must enter a first name.
You must enter a last name.

choices.choiceText: Do not log call on a case
